name: CaveGuy
description:
CaveGuy is a procedurally generated, arcade-style endless adventure game about collecting Diamonds and Coins, upgrading your tools, and fighting off new enemies the deeper you go!

-Features Include-

Endless procedural level generation

3 Tools, 4 Upgrades/Powerups

7 Unique enemies

Various miscellaneous items

Original Soundtrack made by yours truly

Hours* of fun!

*Potential claims made for hours of fun may very per customer. 0 hours of fun is possible. If you or a loved one experiences severe coughing or expediated hair growth while playing, that kind of sucks.
